This constructor supplies default options.

M

MongoDatabaseService - Class in de.wuespace.telestion.extension.mongodb
MongoDatabaseService is a verticle which connects to a local running MongoDB-Database and listens for incoming database requests to process.
MongoDatabaseService() - Constructor for class de.wuespace.telestion.extension.mongodb.MongoDatabaseService
If this constructor is used at all, settings have to be specified in the config file.

This constructor supplies default options.

P

PeriodicDataAggregator - Class in de.wuespace.telestion.extension.mongodb
Verticle periodically querying the database for preconfigured data, publishing the results to a preconfigured outgoing address.

If this constructor is used, settings have to be specified in the config file.

This constructor supplies default options.
